Christy Opara-Thompson (amuru ya na December 24, aro 1971) O bu onye na agbara Nigeria oso na eguriegwu, ejikairi oso hundred metres mara ya
O gbaara ala Nigeria oso na asompi Olympics nke afo 1992 na Barcelona nke di na Spain; ebe ya na ndi out ya bu Beatrice Utondu, Faith Idehen na Mary Onyali no turu Ugo bronze na oso 4 × 100 metres.
